unnormalised: IIT Delhi's admission process for the upcoming academic year is seeing quite a rush! The last date to apply for the M.Tech program is 30/04/2024, and folks are scrambling to get their applications in on time. Apparently, over 25,000 applications have already been received, which is a jump from last year's 22k. Competition, as always, is fierce.
normalised: I-I-T Delhi's admission process for the upcoming academic year is seeing quite a rush! The last date to apply for the M-Tech program is thirtieth april two thousand and twenty four, and folks are scrambling to get their applications in on time. Apparently, over twenty five thousand applications have already been received, which is a jump from last year's twenty two thousand. Competition, as always, is fierce.

unnormalised: Word on the street (err, on the web) is that cutoffs are expected to be high again this year. Last year, some departments saw GATE scores as high as 850 needed for a shot at an interview. Students are busy prepping, burning the midnight oil to ace the entrance exams. Good luck to everyone!
normalised: Word on the street (err, on the web) is that cutoffs are expected to be high again this year. Last year, some departments saw G-A-T-E scores as high as eight hundred and fifty needed for a shot at an interview. Students are busy prepping, burning the midnight oil to ace the entrance exams. Good luck to everyone!

unnormalised: Sources are reporting that the number of seats remains roughly the same as last year, at around 750 across all M.Tech specializations. So, it's a classic case of more applicants chasing the same number of seats. Prep well, folks, prep really well! Don't forget those important dates. Application fees are ₹500 for general candidates and ₹250 for reserved categories.
normalised: Sources are reporting that the number of seats remains roughly the same as last year, at around seven hundred and fifty across all M-Tech specializations. So, it's a classic case of more applicants chasing the same number of seats. Prep well, folks, prep really well! Don't forget those important dates. Application fees are rupee five hundred for general candidates and rupee two hundred and fifty for reserved categories.

unnormalised: The first list of selected candidates is expected to be announced around 15/05/2024. Keep an eye on the IIT Delhi website (iitd.ac.in) for updates. And remember, even if you don't make it this time, there's always next year! Don't lose heart.
normalised: The first list of selected candidates is expected to be announced around fifteenth may two thousand and twenty four. Keep an eye on the I-I-T Delhi website (iitd dot ac dot in) for updates. And remember, even if you don't make it this time, there's always next year! Don't lose heart.

unnormalised: For those who get in, congratulations in advance! Get ready for some serious studies and late-night chai sessions. The academic year is scheduled to begin on 22/07/2024.
normalised: For those who get in, congratulations in advance! Get ready for some serious studies and late-night chai sessions. The academic year is scheduled to begin on twenty second july two thousand and twenty four.
